snippet.title: Prinny Presents NIS Classics Vol. 1 - Phantom Brave Spotlight (Nintendo Switch)
snippet.description:
Learn more @ nisamerica.com/NIS-Classics/vol-1

Follow the touching story of Marona and Ash in Phantom Brave: The Hermuda Triangle Remastered! With its unique combat system, over 50 recruitable Phantom types, and all content from previous releases, this is the definitive version of Phantom Brave!

#NISClassics #NISAmerica #PhantomBrave
